channel.title: Client runner
channel.description: what things/words do i put in the notepad then make run.bat and run the client... cause then it beeps and closes cause idk what words ro put in :mad: :mad:

item.title: Client runner
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“1337 4 l1f3, post:5, topic:259450”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=342598.msg2651006#msg2651006 date=1233523476]
You idiot, he’s trying to help you out.
Show some damn appreciation.

Learning how to create and run a java program would be the right thing to do.
You’ve posted in the wrong section, by the way. This is for help with the official Moparscape client/webclient.
[/quote]
dude he’s saying i dont know how to use a computer i know how to so stfu[/quote]
You know how to go on the internet. Claps. That’s about all.

Read full topic

item.title: Client runner
item.dc:creator: @1337_4_l1f3 1337 4 l1f3
item.description:
@1337_4_l1f3 wrote:

what section? then lol? but ty is the thing u showed me what i need to put in or?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 10:19:44 am[/size][hr]it keeps saying i dont have a main class… am i supposed to have a mainclass already???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:28:40 pm[/size][hr]it says i do[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:259450”]Please learn how to use a Computer and Java.

The Basic Synatx for Java is:

@ECHO OFF
TITLE My client runner
java -Xmx512m YourMainClass
PAUSE

YourMainClass is the class with: (This is normally Java)

public static void main(String args[]) {

Wrong Section[/quote] [quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:259450”]Please learn how to use a Computer and Java.

The Basic Synatx for Java is:

@ECHO OFF
TITLE My client runner
java -Xmx512m YourMainClass
PAUSE

YourMainClass is the class with: (This is normally Java)

public static void main(String args[]) {

Wrong Section[/quote]the runner says i dont have the mainclass what file is it in where is it…??..??..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 12:30:19 pm[/size][hr]and dude stfu i know how to use a damn computer im not a nerd i dont sit here alday too…

Read full topic
